properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 3:20AM EST until January 14 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND BUILDINGS SEAS THIS WEEKEND...

.Seas will gradually build tonight as southeasterly flow
increases. Southerly winds will increase to 15 to 25 knots
Saturday with seas building to 5 to 8 feet. A period of gale
force winds will be possible as winds peak Saturday night into
early Sunday. Winds will gradually diminish late Sunday and
Sunday night, but elevated seas will linger across the waters
into early next week.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 6 to 11 feet expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...From 3 AM Saturday to 1 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY
